messages.alpha_num: The {_field_} can only contain letters and digits.
messages.email: Please enter a valid email address.
messages.max: The {_field_} cannot contain more than {length} characters.
messages.max_value: The {_field_} must be lesser than or equal to {max}.
messages.min: The {_field_} must contain at least {length} characters.
messages.min_value: The {_field_} must be greater than or equal to {min}.
messages.password: The {_field_} must include at least 1 uppercase letter, 1 lowercase letter, 1 digit and 1 special character (e.g. !@/$%&*_+-).
messages.url: Please enter a valid URL. Valid URLs start with http:// or https://.
